title: Sommerfeld.io Tech Radar
description:
This is the technology radar for the sommerfeld.io GitHub organization.
It provides an overview of technologies, tools, frameworks, and practices
we use, assess, or have on our radar for future consideration.

quadrants.name: Languages & Frameworks
quadrants.description: Programming languages, frameworks, and libraries we use to build software

quadrants.name: Development and Delivery Practices
quadrants.description: Methodologies, practices, and approaches for software development and delivery

quadrants.name: Platforms
quadrants.description: Infrastructure platforms, cloud services, and deployment environments

quadrants.name: Infrastructure & Tooling
quadrants.description: Tools, automation, and infrastructure management solutions

rings.name: Adopt
rings.description: Technologies we have high confidence in and use in production

rings.name: Trial
rings.description: Technologies worth pursuing, being used successfully in some projects

rings.name: Assess
rings.description: Technologies worth exploring to understand their potential

rings.name: Hold
rings.description: Technologies to proceed with caution or phase out
